üéÅ The auction winner will receive a unique physical, colored clay figure of Shinobi x Foxieeee, expertly crafted and meticulously sculpted to fulfill your authentic collection. Worldwide shipping.

‚Äì-

ü•∑ Shinobi is the first character and the lone ninja in the SOL collection. He trained to defeat the Evil Bloody King - the mad king is ruining the kingdom with his wickedness. Being vigorously hunted by the royal force, Shinobi has to conceal in the sanctuary while sharpening his skills for the red-letter day coming.
DOB 4th April | Male | Assassin/Jungler | Determined.

ü¶ä The mascot of Shinobi, Foxieeee, was found during an expedition to the highest snowy mountain in the sanctuary. But till now, her accurate inception is still by far the greatest mystery that no one ever finds out.
DOB 24th March | Female | Bicolor | Aloof.
